T02D1699:56a-3: log par lta ba sun dbyung ba /
T02D1699:56a-4: khro gnyer can gyi sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1699:56a-5: yang dag lta ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1699:56a-6: sna tshogs las kyi rnam pa can //
T02D1699:56a-7: ji ltar me yis bud shing bzhin //
T02D1699:56a-8: khro gnyer can gyi sbyor ba bri //
T02D1699:56a-9: re zhig sgrub pa'i thabs nas byung ba'i cho ga
T02D1699:56a-10: rnams dang bsnyen pa 'bum phrag bcus mthu thob par
T02D1699:56a-11: byas la / dur khrod la sogs pa'i shis pa'i
T02D1699:56a-12: gnas su skad cig gi sa khro gnyer can sgrol
T02D1699:56a-13: ma sku mdog sngon mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma
T02D1699:56a-14: stag gi na bza' can rus pa'i phreng ba can
T02D1699:56a-15: sha lus rgyas pa spyan dmar zhing gdangs pa /
T02D1699:56a-16: g-yas gnyis na gri gug dang ral gri /
T02D1699:56a-17: g-yon gnyis kyis thod pa dang sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba /
T02D1699:56a-18: padma dang nyi ma'i steng du bsgoms la /
T02D1699:56a-19: de yi thugs ka'i t'am las 'od 'phros pas ma
T02D1699:56a-20: dag pa'i las can gyi skyes du la thim zhing
T02D1699:56a-22: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re ni shtha d'a r'u na pra ti ha ta /
T02D1699:56a-23: tsitt'a aushma: h'a ni sv'a h'a /
T02D1699:56a-24: zhes pa'i gsang sngags bzlas shing /
T02D1699:56a-26: rtsi nag pos 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa bris la dbus su gzugs brnyan dang /
T02D1699:56a-27: rtsibs dang mu khyud la gsang sngags ming dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D1699:56a-28: de nas yungs kar gyis brab cing gsang sngags bzlas /
T02D1699:56a-29: de'i rjes la sbyin sreg dang /
T02D1699:56a-31: mchod pas khro gnyer can lha mo la mchod la
T02D1699:56a-32: tsher ma can gyi mes spra tshil dang 'khor lo
T02D1699:56a-33: bsros la dug ha si nag po'i shun pa'am /
T02D1699:56a-34: rnga mo'i rgyus pas dkris pa sa bdag gam klu chen po'i gnas su bskyal bar bya'o //
T02D1699:56a-35: smyo dang dbugs ni rtseg pa dang //
T02D1699:56a-36: gyen du blta zhing rgyug par byed //
T02D1699:56a-37: lus po skem dang mig ser dang //
T02D1699:56a-38: lus la sha bkra med dpal 'byung //
T02D1699:56a-39: gzhan yang mdze dang shu ba dang//
T02D1699:56b-1: tshe yi dus kyang byed par 'gyur //
T02D1699:56b-2: gsang sngags sbyor ba'i che ba yis //
T02D1699:56b-3: gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro sems dkrugs shing //
T02D1699:56b-4: las kyi myu gu zad byed pa //
T02D1699:56b-5: khro gnyer can gyi sbyor ba'o //
